report.rawcontent: ##wheat Ploughed: Sept 4, 1951. Seed drilled Squareheads Master 13/4 at 3 bushels per acre: Oct 20. Nitrochalk applied: Apr 23, 1952. Sprayed with D.N.0.C. 2/3 gallon per acre: May 19, May 23. Harvested: July 29
##wheat Ploughcd: Aug 27, 1952. Seed drilled Squareheads Master 13/4 at 3 bushels per acre: Oct 10, Nitrochalk applied: Apr 20, 1953. Sprayed with DNOC 6 1b in 80 gallons: May 22, Harvested: Aug 18.

| ##wheat Ploughed: Sept 17, 1953. Seed drilled Squareheads Master 13/4 at 3 bushels per acre: Oct 23. Sprayed with D.N.0.C. at 6 1b per acre in 80 gals: Apr 27, 1954. Nitrochalk applied: Apr 28. Sprayed with 2,4-D, 2 pints per acre at low volume: May 14. Harvested: Sept 8.

##bare fallow Ploughed: Nov 2, 1954. First dressing of ground chalk applied between 20 and 50 cwt/acre according to acidity pf plots: Feb 15, 1955. Second dressing of ground chalk applied: Mar 8. Ploughed: Mar 17. Third dressing of ground chalk applied: Apr 16, Ploughed: May 6; Aug 2; Sept 26.
